result.ga: Bím ag obair go déanach uaireanta
result.orig: Bím ag obair go déanach uaireanta
result.html: Bím ag obair go déanach uaireantaI work late sometimes.
result.ponchtml: Bím ag obair go déanaċ uaireantaI work late sometimes.

result.eng: They use the sickle sometimes but it is not as good as the knife.
result.ga: Bíonn an corrán in úsáid uaireanta ach níl sé chomh maith leis an scian
result.orig: Bíonn an corrán in úsáid uaireanta ach níl sé chomh maith leis an scian
result.html: Bíonn an corrán in úsáid uaireanta ach níl sé chomh maith leis an scianThey use the sickle sometimes but it is not as good as the knife.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn an corrán in úsáid uaireanta aċ níl sé ċoṁ maiṫ leis an scianThey use the sickle sometimes but it is not as good as the knife.

result.eng: Tomás and I are doing research degrees and as a result we do not have fixed hours.
result.ga: Tá mé féin agus Tomás ag déanamh céimeanna taighde agus mar sin níl uaireanta cinnte againn
result.orig: Tá mé féin agus Tomás ag déanamh céimeanna taighde agus mar sin níl uaireanta cinnte againn
result.html: Tá mé féin agus Tomás ag déanamh céimeanna taighde agus mar sin níl uaireanta cinnte againnTomás and I are doing research degrees and as a result we do not have fixed hours.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé féin agus Tomás ag déanaṁ céimeanna taiġde agus mar sin níl uaireanta cinnte againnTomás and I are doing research degrees and as a result we do not have fixed hours.

result.eng: I am better now but I have a pain at times.
result.ga: Tá mé níos fearr anois ach bíonn pian orm uaireanta
result.orig: Tá mé níos fearr anois ach bíonn pian orm uaireanta
result.html: Tá mé níos fearr anois ach bíonn pian orm uaireantaI am better now but I have a pain at times.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé níos fearr anois aċ bíonn pian orm uaireantaI am better now but I have a pain at times.

result.html: Téim amach uaireantaI sometimes go out.
result.ponchtml: Téim amaċ uaireantaI sometimes go out.

result.html: An dtéann tú amach uaireantaDo you go out sometimes?
result.ponchtml: An dtéann tú amaċ uaireantaDo you go out sometimes?

result.eng: Sometimes I have dinner in a restaurant with my friends.
result.ga: Uaireanta bíonn dinnéar agam i mbialann le mo chairde
result.orig: Uaireanta bíonn dinnéar agam i mbialann le mo chairde

result.ponchtml: Uaireanta bíonn dinnéar agam i mbialann le mo ċairdeSometimes I have dinner in a restaurant with my friends.

result.html: An dtéann tú amach uaireantaDo you go out sometimes?
result.ponchtml: An dtéann tú amaċ uaireantaDo you go out sometimes?

result.eng: She was hit several times and violence was resorted to to cut her hair.
result.ga: Buaileadh í roinnt uaireanta agus chuathas i muinín an fhornirt chun a cuid gruaige a bhearradh
result.orig: Buaileadh í roinnt uaireanta agus chuathas i muinín an fhornirt chun a cuid gruaige a bhearradh
result.html: Buaileadh í roinnt uaireanta agus chuathas i muinín an fhornirt chun a cuid gruaige a bhearradhShe was hit several times and violence was resorted to to cut her hair.
result.ponchtml: Buaileaḋ í roinnt uaireanta agus ċuaṫas i muinín an ḟornirt ċun a cuid gruaige a ḃearraḋShe was hit several times and violence was resorted to to cut her hair.
